title.native: Lv1魔王とワンルーム勇者
title.romaji: Lv1 Maou to One Room Yuusha
title.english: Level 1 Demon Lord and One Room Hero

description:
After his embarrassing defeat at the hands of a brave hero, the Demon Lord is back and ready for revenge… but after ten years apart, the hero, Max, isn’t the dashing do-gooder the Demon Lord remembers. In fact, Max has turned into a shut-in slob with no interest in an epic rematch. Can the Demon Lord whip his former nemesis back into shape, or will he be defeated by the hero-turned-couch-potato once again and join him in his lazy life?

(Source: HIDIVE)
synonyms: Lv1 Demon Lord and One Room Hero

tags.name: Primarily Adult Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters above a high school age.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

title.native: Lv1魔王とワンルーム勇者

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/xexex36) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yoshihiro_watanabe1971/) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/渡邊義弘_(アニメーター%29)

An animator, character designer and adult game artist.

_Not to be confused with the producer [of the same name.](https://anilist.co/staff/233840)_

_Note: Not to be confused with the [painter](https://anilist.co/staff/194863/)._

Affiliated with Atelier Platz.

__[Profile (Verygoo)](http://www.verygoo.jp/artists/ron/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ron_sdf)__

__Ryuuta Iida__, also known by his stage name Ron (stylized as R・O・N) is a Japanese musician, arranger, composer, lyricist, sound producer, guitarist, keyboardist and singer. He was the sound producer and guitarist of Japanese rock band [OLDCODEX](https://anilist.co/staff/112151/OLDCODEX) along with seiyuu [Tatsuhisa Suzuki](https://anilist.co/staff/95735) from 2009-2012.

He currently works under the artist management company Verygoo, has a solo vocal project called [Stereo Dive Foundation](https://anilist.co/staff/118710/Stereo-Dive-Foundation), is a member of the rock band [ROSARYHILL](http://rosaryhill.net/) (2008-) as a keyboardist and vocalist, and works as a music creator for the creative music unit [(K)NoW_NAME](https://anilist.co/staff/126602/KNoW-NAME).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/629551696)

Affiliated with EXPLOSION.

Has a twin brother named [Naoki Etou](https://anilist.co/staff/146123) in the animation industry.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MADKID_official)

MADKID (マッドキッド), formerly known as J-BOYS-5, is a Japanese vocal and dance boy group formed on July 20, 2014. Currently, they consist of 3 vocals and 2 rappers.
In 2018 they made their major-label debut under Nippon Columbia.

Current Members:
* [YOU-TA (ゆーた)](https://anilist.co/staff/270066/YOUTA) (Leader; joined September 2014)
* KAZUKI (かずき)
* SHIN (しん) (Joined February 1, 2017)
* [LIN (りん)](https://anilist.co/staff/270067/LIN)
* [YUKI (ゆき)](https://anilist.co/staff/270070/YUKI)

Former Members:
* KENTO (Leader; left September 2014; now member of IVVY as KENTO.i)
* RIKITO (Left May 2015)
* CASEY (Joined in summer 2015, left January 2016)
Also is a writer, producer and director for ADV Films and Robotboy Films.
Also is a writer, producer and director for ADV Films and Robotboy Films.
